caseTitle: Faqir Muhammad v. Khursheed Bibi, etc
tagline: Discussion: (1) Order XLI, Rule 1, 3 & 9 CPC. (2) Section 5 and 14 of the Limitation Act. (3) Duty of Appellate Court to determine territorial and pecuniary jurisdiction at initial stage. (4) An act of the court shall prejudice no man (Actus curiae neminem gravabit).
